name: Norn

specialAbilities.name: Blessing of the Forest Guardian
specialAbilities.description: Advantage on saving throws against fear effects for 24 hours.

classFeatures.name: Second Wind
classFeatures.description: Once per short rest, regain 1d10 + fighter level HP as a bonus action (restored)

classFeatures.name: Action Surge
classFeatures.description: Once per short rest, take one additional action on your turn (restored)

classFeatures.name: Improved Critical
classFeatures.description: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20

equipment.description: A worn lantern once belonging to Scout Elen, faintly glowing with residual warmth.
A torn piece of fabric matching Scout Elen's cloak, found in the cellar.
A crumpled note with faint writing, possibly left by Scout Elen.

equipment.item_name: Old bronze key marked with a faded raven sigil
equipment.description: An ancient bronze key bearing a faded raven sigil, given by Elder Mirna to access a hidden passage beneath the old keep.
A tarnished silver amulet once used in blessing rituals, bearing a delicate stag motif.
A ceremonial dagger with a wooden handle, possibly used as a focus for ward rituals.

equipment.item_name: Stone Tablet Fragment with Ritual Instructions
equipment.description: A fragment of a stone tablet inscribed with partial ritual instructions.

attacksAndSpellcasting.name: Sturdy Bow
attacksAndSpellcasting.description: A sturdy bow for ranged attacks

personality_traits: I'm always polite and respectful. I don't trust my gut feelings, so I tend to hesitate even when I should act quickly.
ideals: Responsibility. I do what I must and obey just authority.
bonds: I fight for those who cannot fight for themselves.
flaws: I have a hard time hiding my true feelings. My sharp tongue often gets me into trouble.
